clover.label: Flex
clover.description: The Clover Flex is a sales-ready card reader allowing you to take payments on the go — anywhere — with a tap, swipe or scan.
features: • Remote onboarding for Apple Pay, Alipay, and Android Pay
• Real-time employee permissions and inventory management
• Multi-connectivity via WiFi, mobile data, and cloud services
• Scalable with full Clover hardware accessory range

clover.label: Flex Pocket
clover.description: The Clover Flex Pocket is a compact, portable payment device that fits in your pocket, allowing you to take payments anywhere with ease.
features: • Compact design that fits in your pocket
• Supports contactless payments including Apple Pay and Google Pay
• High-resolution touchscreen for easy navigation
• Long-lasting battery for extended use

clover.label: Mini
clover.description: The Clover Mini is a versatile point-of-sale terminal that combines a sleek design with powerful features to streamline your business operations.
features: • Intuitive business management features
• Compact design with payment processing, inventory, and scheduling
• Wide range of integrated apps for customization

clover.label: Station Solo
clover.description: The Clover Station Solo is an all-in-one point-of-sale system that combines a sleek design with powerful features to streamline your business operations.
features: • All-in-one design with integrated payment processing, inventory, and scheduling
• Large touchscreen for easy navigation
• Wide range of integrated apps for customization

clover.label: Station Duo
clover.description: Clover Station Duo A fast, dual-screen POS  Our all in one POS moves at the speed of your business. Step up your transactions with a customer-facing screen.
features: • Dual-screen POS with 14″ HD display and 8″ customer touchscreen
• All-in-one system with cash drawer and printer
• Seamless integration with multiple Clover devices and accessories
• Customizable for your specific business needs

worldpay.label: DX4000
worldpay.description: A compact Android-based terminal designed for secure, reliable, and flexible payments.
features: • Android 10 with 5″ HD touchscreen
• Built-in thermal printer and multi-connectivity
• Supports EMV, NFC, magstripe, and digital wallets
• PCI PTS v6 certified for retail and service businesses

worldpay.label: DX8000
worldpay.description: A high-performance handheld terminal with a large screen and full payment flexibility.
features: • Android 10 with 5.5″ HD touchscreen
• Built-in thermal printer and multi-connectivity
• Supports EMV, NFC, magstripe, and digital wallets
• PCI PTS v6 certified for retail and service businesses

worldpay.label: 360 Lite
worldpay.description: Worldpay 360 Lite is a cost-effective payment solution designed for small businesses, offering essential features to manage transactions efficiently.
features: • Competitive processing rates with no hidden fees
• Easy-to-use online dashboard for transaction management
• Supports multiple payment methods including credit, debit, and digital wallets
• 24/7 customer support to assist with any issues

worldpay.label: 360 Standard
worldpay.description: Worldpay 360 Standard is a comprehensive payment solution designed for growing businesses, offering advanced features to streamline payment processing and enhance customer experience.
features: • Competitive processing rates with no hidden fees
• Advanced fraud protection and security features
• Supports multiple payment methods including credit, debit, and digital wallets
• Robust reporting and analytics tools
• 24/7 customer support to assist with any issues

worldpay.label: 360 Pro
worldpay.description: Worldpay 360 Pro is an advanced payment solution designed for established businesses, offering a full suite of features to optimize payment processing and drive business growth.
features: • Customized pricing plans to suit business needs
• Comprehensive fraud protection and security features
• Supports multiple payment methods including credit, debit, and digital wallets
• Advanced reporting and analytics tools
• Dedicated account management and 24/7 customer support
